regen.absent_element: procedure for driver in failed cab to request reestablishment of the call
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a mechanism for the driver in a failed cab to send a request to the lead cab to reestablish the call.

regen.absent_element: specification for the driver in a cab where the call fails to reestablish the call by calling the lead cab
regen.new_specification: If the call fails in any cab other than the lead traction vehicle, the system shall provide functionality for the driver in that cab to automatically or manually initiate a call to the lead cab to request reestablishment of the multi-driver radio connection.

regen.absent_element: reestablishment procedure for call failure in non-lead traction vehicles
regen.new_specification: If the call fails to any other cab, the system shall automatically prompt the driver in that cab to call the lead cab and request reestablishment of the call.

label: If the call fails to any other cab, the driver in that cab will call the lead cab and request re-establishment of the call.
absence: situation of call failure in other cabs(not the lead traction vehicle)
